Mais l, en tant que cheville ouvri?re de ce processus lectoral, je vous assure que Gbagbo a perdu . Robert Thompson points out that, as a British unknown looking for American fame, Simon Cowell used meanness as a savvy PR move- one that wouldn't work for Jennifer Lopez or Steven Tyler . Outside of the music industry, no one in the United States knew who Simon Cowell was until he started making nasty comments during the first season promotions for the show, he says.`` Being mean was what made him a celebrity.
